description.general.borderOpacity: Opacity of decoration border in __```%```__. __```1```__ is no opacity.
description.general.backgroundOpacity: Opacity of background color of selection in __```%```__. __```1```__ is no opacity.
description.statusText.color:
Change the Inline Status Text color. 

Color must be in hex color of __```#RRGGBB```__.
description.statusText.backgroundColor:
Change the Inline Status Text background color. 

Color must be in hex color of __```#RRGGBB```__,  __```null```__ or __```""```__ (No background).
description.statusText.opacity: Opacity of background color of selection in __```%```__. __```1```__ is no opacity.
description.statusText.cursorOnlyText:
Status Text for _'Cursor Only Selection'_. 

__```${col}```__ is where meta/delta information will be displayed.
description.statusText.singleLineText:
Status Text for _'Single Line Selection'_. 

__```${character}```__ is where selection information will be displayed.
description.statusText.multiLineCursorTe:
Status Text for _'Multi Line Selection (Active Cursor)'_. 

__```${line}```__, __```${character}```__ is where meta/delta information will be displayed.
description.statusText.multiLineAnchorTe:
Status Text for _'Multi Line Selection (Anchor)'_. 

__```${line}```__, __```${character}```__ is where meta/delta information will be displayed.
description.statusText.multiCursorText:
Status Text for _'Multi Cursor Selection'_. 

__```${nth}```__, __```${count}```__, __```${line}```__, __```${character}```__ is where meta/delta information will be displayed.
description.cursorOnly.borderColor:
Change the border color. 

Color must be in hex color of __```#RRGGBB```__.
description.cursorOnly.backgroundColor:
Change the background color. 

Color must be in hex color of __```#RRGGBB```__,  __```null```__ or __```""```__ (No background).
description.cursorOnly.borderWidth: Border width, should use unit of __```'px'```__ or __```'em'```__.
description.cursorOnly.borderStyle: Main Border style on current line.
description.cursorOnly.borderStyleWithaf: (not working yet) Use this border style only when [bottom | after Cursor]. this is border style for previous range.
description.singleLine.borderColor:
Change the border color. 

Color must be in hex color of __```#RRGGBB```__.
description.singleLine.backgroundColor:
Change the background color. 

Color must be in hex color of __```#RRGGBB```__,  __```null```__ or __```""```__ (No background).
description.singleLine.borderWidth: Border width, should use unit of __```'px'```__ or __```'em'```__.
description.multiLine.borderColor:
Change the border color. 

Color must be in hex color of __```#RRGGBB```__.
description.multiLine.backgroundColor:
Change the background color. 

Color must be in hex color of __```#RRGGBB```__,  __```null```__ or __```""```__ (No background).
description.multiLine.borderWidth: Border width, should use unit of __```'px'```__ or __```'em'```__.
description.multiCursor.borderColor:
Change the border color. 

Color must be in hex color of __```#RRGGBB```__.
description.multiCursor.backgroundColor:
Change the background color. 

Color must be in hex color of __```#RRGGBB```__,  __```null```__ or __```""```__ (No background).
description.multiCursor.borderWidth: Border width, should use unit of __```'px'```__ or __```'em'```__.
